text: Sergio Apostol (born January 17, 1935) is a Filipino politician. From 1992 until 2001 and from 2010 until 2016, he was a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Majority leaders of the House of Representatives of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Eastern Visayas Category:Samar (province)
title: Sergio Apostol
